targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(event) as count
FROM quakes
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(event) as count
FROM
  quakes
WHERE
  ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))<=-20 
  AND
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)

SELECT
  count(event) as count
FROM
  quakes
WHERE
  ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))>-20  AND ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))<=-10
  AND
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)

SELECT
  count(event) as count
FROM
  quakes
WHERE
  ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))>-10 
  AND
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)

SELECT
  count(event) as count
FROM
  quakes
WHERE
  ST_M(ST_AsText(coors))>=4.5
  AND
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)

SELECT
  count(event) as count
FROM
  quakes
WHERE
  ST_M(ST_AsText(coors))<4.5 AND ST_M(ST_AsText(coors))>=2.5
  AND
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)

SELECT
  count(event) as count
FROM
  quakes
WHERE
  ST_M(ST_AsText(coors))<2.5
  AND
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)

panels.description: Quakes that were felt by populations, special machines

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(event) as count
FROM
  quakes
WHERE
  intensity!='NULL'
  AND
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)

panels.title: Quakes Felt#

panels.description: Average number of quake during time period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  avg(cnt)::integer AS avg FROM
(SELECT
 date_trunc('hour',tstamp) as hour,count(event) as cnt 
FROM quakes
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
GROUP BY hour) a

panels.title: Quakes per hour

panels.description: Median of quakes during time period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY cnt) as median FROM
(SELECT
 date_trunc('hour',tstamp) as hour,count(event) as cnt 
FROM quakes
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
GROUP BY hour) a

panels.title: Quakes per hour

panels.description: Median of quakes during time period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY cnt) as median FROM
(SELECT
 date_trunc('hour',tstamp) as hour,count(a.event) as cnt 
FROM quakes a INNER JOIN intensities b ON a.event=b.event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
GROUP BY hour) a

panels.title: Quakes felt per hour

panels.description: Median of quake depth during time period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY deep) as median FROM
(SELECT
 date_trunc('hour',tstamp) as hour,ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors)) as deep 
FROM quakes 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
  AND ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))>-20
) a

panels.title: Shallow depth median

panels.description: Median of quake depth during time period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY deep) as median FROM
(SELECT
 date_trunc('hour',tstamp) as hour,ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors)) as deep 
FROM quakes 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
  AND ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))<=-20
) a

panels.title: Deep depth median

panels.description: Median of quake depth during time period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY magnitude) as median FROM
(SELECT
 date_trunc('hour',tstamp) as hour,ST_M(ST_AsText(coors)) as magnitude
FROM quakes 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
  AND ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))>-20
) a

panels.title: Shallow Quakes magnitude

panels.description: Median of quake depth during time period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY magnitude) as median FROM
(SELECT
 date_trunc('hour',tstamp) as hour,ST_M(ST_AsText(coors)) as magnitude
FROM quakes 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
  AND ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))<=-20
) a

panels.title: Deep Quakes magnitude

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(tstamp,$__interval),
  avg(ST_M(ST_AsText(coors))) AS "type"
FROM quakes
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp) AND
  ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors)) > -20
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(tstamp,$__interval),
  avg(ST_M(ST_AsText(coors))) AS "type"
FROM quakes
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp) AND
  ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors)) <= -20
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(tstamp,$__interval),
  avg(ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))) AS "type"
FROM quakes
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
 date_trunc('hour',tstamp) as time,count(event) as cnt 
FROM quakes
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
 date_trunc('hour',tstamp) as time,min(ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))) as min,max(ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))) as max 
FROM quakes
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  date_trunc('day',tstamp) as time,PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))) as median
FROM quakes
WHERE
  ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))<-1*$depth AND
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
GROUP BY time

SELECT
 date_trunc('hour',tstamp) as time,min(ST_M(ST_AsText(coors))) as min,max(ST_M(ST_AsText(coors))) as max
FROM quakes
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  date_trunc('day',tstamp) as time,PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY ST_M(ST_AsText(coors))) as median
FROM quakes
WHERE
  ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))<-1*$depth AND
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
GROUP BY time

SELECT
 date_trunc('hour',tstamp) as time,min(b.min) as min,max(b.max) as max
FROM quakes a
INNER JOIN intensities b ON a.event=b.event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  date_trunc('day',tstamp) as time,PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY max) as median
FROM quakes a
INNER JOIN intensities b ON a.event=b.event
WHERE
  ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))<-1*$depth AND
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
GROUP BY time

SELECT
  tstamp as "time",
  avg(ST_Y(ST_AsText(coors))) AS "latitude",
  avg(ST_X(ST_AsText(coors))) AS "longitude"
FROM quakes
WHERE
  ST_Z(ST_AsText(coors))<-1*$depth AND
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  tstamp as "time",
  avg(ST_Y(ST_AsText(coors))) AS "latitude",
  avg(ST_X(ST_AsText(coors))) AS "longitude"
FROM acceleration
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  tstamp as "time",
  ST_Y(ST_AsText(b.coors)) AS "latitude",
  ST_X(ST_AsText(b.coors)) AS "longitude",
  (min+max)/2 as mag
FROM quakes a
INNER JOIN intensity_coors b 
ON a.event=b.event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp)
ORDER BY 1
